modlist.name: Unlimited Flight
modlist.description: Fly anywhere you please without stalling out or slowing down too much.

modlist.name: Visible Cursor
modlist.description: Set the cursor to be visible in the game so the mouse can be used in the menu.

modlist.name: Run Statistics
modlist.description: Record assorted statistics about your run as you fly. Great for analyzing and comparing runs. Statistics will be saved in Documents/SFMF/rundata.csv.

modlist.name: Next World
modlist.description: Press tab (on keyboard) or X (on controller) to automatically advance to the next world.

modlist.name: Speedometer
modlist.description: Displays the current player speed in the bottom left corner of the game.

modlist.name: High Score Trail
modlist.description: Leaves a trail behind your player following your highest scoring run in any particular world.
